entry.question: Cog is equipped to a bot which dies while Scavenge the Battlefield is in effect. Will Cog transfer to another bot or will he leave the Battlefield first and end up in KO area?
entry.answer: Yes, Scavenge the Battlefield allows you to move Cog in his Weapon mode to another character on the Battlefield.
